reviews.review_msg: Prof tended to go off on tangents. was not clear what she wanted us to learn.  would give us 5 min pop quizzes randomly to make sure we were doing the reading.  compared to my other profs, she was very hard marker giving me one grade lower on average than all my other profs.  not very approachable, can be awkward at times.  she is average prof.

She's a nice person and a fair marker. Her lectures are not very helpful with understanding security issues. She does allow a lot of academic freedom and creativity when it comes to presentations and papers.
Very dry. It gets hard to get to lectures because  they can be very very boring.  She is definitely nice but I would say a bit of a tough marker.

A waste of time!  Sandra is so boring... Tries to involve the class in discussions that go nowhere. Quotation assignments are easy marks but practically irrelevant. Her custom courseware isn't fit for the fire. I don't think I learned anything in this course.

MacLean knows her stuff, but POL  437 seemed like a waste of time. Not very interesting or engaging. It seemed like a review of Poli Sci 300 level courses. The lecturing style is tedious for a class with 15 people. Not recommended.

Horrible. i have no idea what i am supposed to study for the final. the assignments are irrelevant to what we are learning. the topic overall seems interesting, but she kills it. i feel sorry for the TA's cause she is butchering their major, making it look bad.

Terrible, utterly terrible.  Fatuous, paternalistic and self righteous teaching style; randomn and inappropriate assignments and marking.  I have learned absolutely nothing in this class to date - it never once made me think (except of semester's end with longing...)

She is a fair marker, but her lectures tend to be dry and by the end, most students were yawning and few were paying much attention. She may not be the worst PoliSci professor, but definitely isn't the best.
very friendly and helpful prof, but her lectures are REALLY boring, and she tends to go offtopic.  she is also very knowledgeable, and quite clear in her lectures. overall i'll take her class again
Super nice, really helpful in office hours, always willing to talk and provoke you to think about things in a different manner.
unorganized throughout the semester
Super nice, but can be tough
Awesome Prof! The Best.
I liked her, she is smart and knows her stuff. The people ducking out of class are clowns anyway so who cares what they or their loser friends think?

Sandra is the best prof in this often egotistical department. SFU is so lucky to get her from Dalhousie. Nice, approachable, and sympathetic. What more could you ask for? She is also brilliant, but open to alternative answers to complex issuees.

Well... her lectures leave something to desire... she's one of those that put everything on the powerpoint then reads it off and then sends it to you.... and the course turns out more like a HIST than a Comp. Pol. course... nice, but not great lecturer
Very nice always willing to help
No Comments

The instructor is nice but the lectures are not so hot and clear. She wants to say a lot in ashort period of time and just goes on and on.. But good TA, Linda just knows a lot and she is very helpful but very hard marker.Still count on her!
Great course and professor. She's super helpful and the course is structured in a manner that works very well. I simply can't comprehend why some have a problem with her.
Course is super easy but lectures were painful. She rambles about uninteresting and unrelated stuff for half the class. By the middle of the semester attendance to lecture was only 30%, if that.
Excellent course; super helpful professor
Excellent professor. She's super nice. This course on Governance and Globalisation is very interesting.
This was the worst course I have ever taken in my four years at SFU. MacLean managed to say nothing in the 13 weeks of class and by week 8 had an attendance rating of maybe 33 %!
Very nice person - but half the time doesn't know what she's trying to say
This class is so bad, it's laughable. Not only is she a boring speaker, but what is up with all the etcs...I mean it is practically every other word out of her mouth.
zzzzzzzzzzzz... what the hades kind of class is that... I paid my tuition for her to teach something, not to waste time and be full of herself to the class...
stop asking the class questions that you don't know the answer to!!!!! BOR-RING!
Incredibly boring, not sure what class is about...6 weeks in/wastes time a lot!
No commanding presence at all, very wishy washy, no clear course structure
The worst  professor  I've ever had. You will learn NOTHING from her 'courses'.
If you don't expect to learn anything, but you want to get a bad mark, take her.
Worst teacher I have ever had, hands down.
